info.title: Fax as a Service (FaaS) API
info.description: This is the FaaS API which provides access to the Fax as a Service platform features via REST API.

tags.name: Webhook Fax Event Notification Controller
tags.description: APIs for webhook fax event notification management

get.description: Retrieves all of the customer webhooks information details.

post.description: Creates a webhook for the customer from the provided parameters.

get.summary: Gets all fax event webhook configurations specific for DIDs
get.description: Retrieves all of the customer's fax event webhook configurations associated with the customer's DIDs.

200.description: DIDs Fax Event notification webhooks configuration retrieved successfully

post.summary: Create a new fax event webhook configurations for a customer's DID
post.description: Creates a new FaxEvent webhook configuration for a customer's specific DID.

201.description: Fax Event Webhook Notification configuration created successfully for specified DID

404.description: Customer DID or Webhook ID not found

get.summary: Gets all default fax event webhook configurations
get.description: Retrieves all of the customer's default fax event webhook configurations.

200.description: Default Fax Event Webhook configuration retrieved successfully

post.summary: Create a new default fax event webhook configurations
post.description: Creates a new default FaxEvent webhook configuration for the customer

201.description: Default Fax Event Webhook Notification configuration created successfully

get.description: Retrieve the customer's current fax list with each fax detail based on sorting parameters.

post.summary: Send a fax using the provided parameters
post.description: Queues a fax to be sent using the provided parameters, immediately returning the fax operational details.

post.summary: Cancel a currently ongoing outbound fax by ID
post.description: Cancel a customer's currently ongoing outbound fax by ID.

404.description: Fax with specified ID not found

post.summary: Deletes multiple existent faxes by list of IDs
post.description: Attempts to delete all of the faxes specified in the provided list of IDs. Returns a result body with the details of the bulk operation.

200.description: Specified Bulk Fax Deletion executed with success

get.description: Retrieves a specific customer webhook details.

delete.description: Updates a customer webhook details from the provided parameters by ID

patch.summary: Updates a webhook details by ID
patch.description: Updates a customer webhook details from the provided parameters by ID

delete.summary: Deletes a customer's DID fax event webhook configuration by ID
delete.description: Deletes an existent customer's DID fax event webhook configuration by customer's DID and webhook ID

204.description: Customer DID Fax Event Webhook Notification configuration deleted successfully

404.description: Specified Customer DID or Webhook ID not found

patch.summary: Update an existent customer's DID fax event webhook configuration by customer's webhook ID and DID
patch.description: Update an existent customer's customer's DID fax event webhook configuration using provided parameters and the customer's webhook ID and DID

204.description: Customer DID Fax Event Webhook Notification configuration updated successfully

404.description: Customer DID or Webhook ID not found

delete.summary: Deletes a default fax event webhook configuration by ID
delete.description: Deletes an existent customer's default fax event webhook configuration by webhook ID

204.description: Default Fax Event Webhook Notification configuration deleted successfully

patch.summary: Update an existent customer's default fax event webhook configuration by webhook ID
patch.description: Update an existent customer's default fax event webhook configuration using provided parameters and the customer's webhook ID

204.description: Default Fax Event Webhook Notification configuration updated successfully

get.summary: List the DIDs associated with the Customer
get.description: Creates a paginated list of all customer associated DIDs detailed information.

get.summary: Get fax information details by ID
get.description: Retrieve the customer's fax information details specified by ID

404.description: Fax with specified ID not found

delete.description: Deletes an existent customer's fax by ID.

404.description: Fax with specified ID not found

get.summary: Get the fax pdf file by ID
get.description: Retrieve the customer's fax pdf file specified by ID

404.description: Fax with specified ID not found

get.summary: Get customer's current unread fax list
get.description: Retrieve the customer's current unread fax list with each fax detail based on sorting parameters.

get.summary: Get customer's current fax list by DID
get.description: Retrieve the customer's current fax list with each fax detail based on sorting parameters, for a specific customer's DID.

get.summary: Get customer's current unread fax list by DID
get.description: Retrieve the customer's current unread fax list with each fax detail based on sorting parameters, for a specific customer's DID.
